synopsis.text: Miruko Koide, Manabu Numata, and Ataru Doumoto join Tsukasa Mend≈ç on his quest to become the world's greatest Gigant Shooter player, a game reminiscent of pog battles. Armed with the menko card 'King Menger' left by his father, Tsukasa navigates the world of competitive gaming alongside his unique group of allies: the adorable yet tsundere Miruko, the bespectacled and intimidating Manabu, and the sharp-tongued realist Ataru. This anime delves into the thrilling adventures of Tsukasa and his friends as they strive for victory in the high-stakes world of Gigant Shooter.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
